hero.title: Digital and Intelligent Agriculture Research Group
hero.description2: Committed to breaking through key scientific issues in smart agriculture, such as theories, technologies, and equipment, and establishing a standard technological model and ecosystem for smart agriculture that combines the 'innovation chain' with the 'industry chain', providing strong technological support for government smart decision-making and precision management for production and business entities.

cta.title: Contact Us
cta.description1: Our research group is always open to welcoming undergraduate interns, visiting graduate students, postdoctoral researchers, and other collaborators.
cta.description2: If you have any questions, please contact us via email, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

projects1.title: With stories and good looks! This group of new farmers is trending again!
projects1.description: In March this year, to create a work environment where colleagues can help each other, pursue personal growth, and realize their self-worth, the office developed a set of values-based performance assessment criteria.

projects2.title: Exploring Industry Opportunities Hidden in Farmlands — The Yangtze River Delta Smart Agriculture Research Institute Supports the New Development of Smart Agriculture
projects2.description: This helps team members record their key moments of growth through challenges and breakthroughs in their personal development.

projects3.title: Li Jianbing, Director of the Land Quality Monitoring and Protection Center of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, and his team conducted a research visit to the Yangtze River Delta Smart Agriculture Research Institute.
projects3.description: On November 23, 2023,  Director of the Land Quality and Plant Protection Station of Kunshan City, along with their team, visited the Yangtze River Delta Smart Agriculture Research Institute.

team.name: Research Team
team.description: The team is composed of graduate and doctoral students from various academic backgrounds, a group of passionate innovators. We are committed to serving agriculture through our own technologies, striving to become 'new farmers' who contribute to the country.

member1.name: ShiYun
member1.description: Born in March 1979 in Liyang, Jiangsu, with a Ph.D., he is a researcher and doctoral supervisor at the Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences. He has long been engaged in fundamental and applied research on spatial information acquisition and analysis using multi-sensor data fusion. Notably, he has achieved world-leading research results in areas such as multi-sensor data collaborative acquisition and transmission, multi-platform multi-sensor data fusion, and three-dimensional spatial information acquisition and analysis based on fused data. He has independently developed a 3D information acquisition and analysis processing system based on multiple sensors, which has been adopted by numerous enterprises and institutions both domestically and internationally, generating significant social and economic value. He has led 5 projects, received 1 award, published more than 30 papers, and obtained 15 patents/software copyrights

member2.name: Yu Qiang Yi
member2.description: 农学博士，博士生导师 。中国农业科学院农业资源与农业区划研究所 研究员 ，智慧农业创新团队青年首席，入选 首批中国农业科学院青年创新专项资助。 担任国务院第三次全国土壤普查专家技术指导组专家、现代农业产业技术体系北京市数字农业创新团队岗位专家。主要从事土地系统、农业遥感、智慧耕地研究，在天空地一体化智能感知、耕地利用遥感监测、高标准农田监测监管、农业土地系统可持续评价等方面取得重要进展。主持国家级科研项目4项，包括国家自然科学基金2项、国家重点研发计划课题2项，第一/通讯作者在Nature Food等国际知名SCI期刊发表论文20余篇，获省部级奖励3项。

member1.name: 车紫进
member1.area: 深度学习 智慧农业

info.location: Address:12, Zhongguancun South Street, Haidian District, Beijing, China

metadata.title: Digital and Intelligent Agriculture Research Group - CAAS
metadata.description: A powerful Chrome extension that helps you better manage tabs and improve productivity
metadata.keywords: Chrome Extension, Tab Management, Productivity Tools, Browser Extensions

features.title: Research Areas
features.description1: The deep integration of emerging information technologies such as remote sensing networks, big data, and artificial intelligence with agriculture, with a research focus on the agricultural process of 'intelligent perception—intelligent diagnosis—intelligent decision-making.'
features.description2: The research focuses on the mechanisms and methods of remote sensing monitoring of arable land, agricultural information collection and intelligent equipment for operations, sky-earth big data mining and analysis, agricultural product quality traceability, and spatial planning of smart agriculture parks. The goal is to break through the core theories, technologies, equipment, and system platforms of smart agriculture, promote the assembly, integration, and maturation of equipment, technologies, and systems, and establish standardized and replicable smart agriculture application models.

bookmarks.title: Temporal and Spatial Monitoring and Early Warning of Farmland System

share.title: Sky-Earth Data Capsule and Smart Engine Platform

faq.title: Research Results
faq.description: Since the establishment of the team, we have published dozens of academic papers, applied for multiple patents, and obtained software copyrights.
